DOC.brief_summary: This study explores the effect of oxybutynin topical gel on gastric emptying
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Oxybutynin Topical Gel on Gastric Emptying
DOC.criteria: Adult, healthy, postmenopausal females Patients for whom OTG or acetaminophen is contraindicated. Abnormality of the GI tract. Taking drugs that affect gastric motility.
